# pic [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/gillstrom/pic.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/gillstrom/pic)

> My amazing module


## Install

```
$ npm install --save pic
```


## Usage

```js
var pic = require('pic');

pic('unicorns');
//=> unicorns & rainbows
```


## API

### pic(input, [options])

#### input

*Required*  
Type: `string`

Lorem ipsum.

#### options

##### foo

Type: `boolean`  
Default: `false`

Lorem ipsum.
